answers.answer: Its worth mentioning as could be preeclampsia. Swelling is a sign of it I have be watched im 36+2
swelling is normal just mention it anyway they may just take Your blood pressure and check a few things

question: I've never had this happen before, so just wondering if it's normal! I'm 36+4 and last night while laying in bed my face got really flushed and felt swollen? It kinda freaked me out cos i wasn't doing anything out of the ordinary. My hands recently started to swell also. I have an appointment today, should i bring this up?
title: face flushing?
